name: pat
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 to touch someone or something gently and usually repeatedly with the hand flat: He patted my head/patted me on the head affectionately. I bent down to pat the little puppy.
More examplesFewer examplesShe patted him on the head as she went past.He patted her on the back affectionately.He patted her arm reassuringly.She patted the dog on the head.She patted him lightly on the bottom.
